Entry.JapaneseText: 昨日の夜、子供の頃の夢を見た……
Entry.EnglishText: Last night, I dreamt of when I was a child...

Entry.JapaneseText: <Eugene>の子供の頃なんて、 想像つかないなぁ♪
Entry.EnglishText: I can't imagine you ever being a child♪

Entry.JapaneseText: そう言うが、近所では 可愛いと評判だったんだぞ。
Entry.EnglishText: You say that, but I was considered to be cute around the neighborhood.

Entry.JapaneseText: ますます想像つかないやー♪
Entry.EnglishText: Now I really can't imagine it♪

Entry.JapaneseText: それが、どうして こうなってしまったのか……
Entry.EnglishText: How did he turn out like that, I wonder...?

Entry.JapaneseText: <Mao>、おまえもそのうち、 そう言われるようになるんだぞ。
Entry.EnglishText: You know, <Mao>, when you're that old, people will be saying the same things about you.
